The RasTech Jet Buran.

<iframe width="640" height="480" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>
That looks pretty good. Is it for glide testing?
The Russians actually built one of these but yeah its mainly for glide testing. It was going to be an energia-buran but I never got the energia to look or fly right.
